attributes.action: Stop stripping UK citizens from their Citizenship
attributes.additional_details:
We are British citizens and we have the right to live here as much as anyone else. We have lived here all our lives, this is our home and we can’t live anywhere else. 
Thank you.
attributes.background:
The government trying to pass a bill to be able to remove citizenship from ethnic minorities without notice.
I would like this petition to stop this bill.
Thank you.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601611
